content:
On the Left Bank of the Dnieper, the enemy decided to 2 unsuccessful storms of our positions, but, having suffered losses, retreated.

About thisreported March 23Defense forces of South of Ukraine.

The enemy does not stop attempts to assault actions both in Kherson and Orikhiv directions.

He carried out 4 assaults in the area of the robot, 5 - in the Staromayorsk district and 1 in the Novodarivka district.

Our fighters continue to take comprehensive measures to keep and strengthen the bridgeheads

The invaders do not stop air intelligence, press artillery shelling, strike aviation strikes, use a large number of shock drones of different types.

There are no ships of hostile fleet in the Black and Azov seas. Rocket launchers are brought to the base points.

Asreported the armyinform, 69 hostages took place on the front during the day, most of all - in the Novopavlovsky direction.
title: The enemy attacked twice in the area of Krynok
description: This was reported on March 23 by the forces of the South of Ukraine. The enemy does not stop attempts ...
author: Army Inform
